hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah say; 'If you cannot find an Izar then wear pants, and if you cannot find sandals then wear khuffs, but cut them so that they come lower than the ankles

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي لُبْسِ الْخُفَّيْنِ فِي الإِحْرَامِ لِمَنْ لاَ يَجِدُ نَعْلَيْنِ .
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing Khuffs in Ihram for the one who Cannot Find any Sandals
